channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Surviving A Potential AI Bubble Burst

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil appears in appeals court as Trump administration continues efforts to deport him

item.title: WATCH: Woman details getting justice nearly 12 years after her sexual assault
item.description: After more than a decade, Shannon Keeler was able to confront the man who confessed to sexually assaulting her at a 2013 fraternity party.

item.title: Vance: Israel-Hamas ceasefire "going frankly better than I expected"
item.description: Vice President JD Vance urged "patience" as Israel waits for the return of all the hostages' remains from Hamas.

item.title: WATCH: Part of White House East Wing demolished as Trump begins ballroom construction
item.description: Part of the White House East Wing was demolished on Monday as President Trump sets out to build a massive ballroom.

item.title: 60% of workers are unhappy with key aspects of their job, survey finds
item.description: Six in 10 employees say their jobs are falling short on issues including pay, scheduling and career advancement, a new analysis finds.

item.title: Redrawn GOP congressional map in North Carolina on brink of approval
item.description: The proposed map targets a closely- divided House district currently held by a Democrat.
